post.description: Convert text to speech using the specified voice

200.description: Returns either binary audio or JSON with phoneme data based on include_phonemes parameter

schema.description: Binary audio file (when include_phonemes=false or omitted)
Binary audio file (when include_phonemes=false or omitted)
JSON response with base64 audio and phoneme data (when include_phonemes=true)

phonemes.description: Phoneme timing data with IPA symbols

start_times_seconds.description: Start times for each phoneme in seconds

durations_seconds.description: Duration for each phoneme in seconds

english-sample.description: Example response for English text "Hello" with phoneme timing information

korean-sample.description: Example response for Korean text "안녕하세요" with phoneme timing information

X-Audio-Length.description: Duration of the audio in seconds

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid request data for duration prediction or invalid request body/headers

500.description: Internal Server Error: Failed to convert text to speech

post.summary: Convert text to speech with streaming response
post.description: Convert text to speech using the specified voice with streaming response. Returns binary audio stream.

200.description: Streaming audio data in binary format or NDJSON format with phoneme data based on includePhonemes parameter

schema.description: Binary audio stream (when includePhonemes=false or omitted)
Binary audio stream (when includePhonemes=false or omitted)
NDJSON stream with consistent format - each chunk contains audio_base64 and phonemes fields (one null, one populated)

Content-Type.description: Content type: audio/* for binary stream, application/x-ndjson for phoneme data

X-Content-Type-Options.description: Security header to prevent MIME sniffing

Trailer.description: Announces that X-Audio-Length will be sent as a trailer header

X-Audio-Length.description: Total duration of the audio in seconds (sent as trailer header after streaming completes)

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid request data or parameters

429.description: Too Many Requests: Rate limit exceeded

500.description: Internal Server Error: Failed to process streaming TTS

post.description: Predict the duration of text-to-speech conversion without generating audio

200.description: Returns predicted duration of the audio in seconds

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid request data for duration prediction or invalid request body/headers

500.description: Internal Server Error: Failed to convert text to speech

get.description: Gets a paginated list of voices available to the user based on internal group logic, using token-based pagination.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 20, min: 10, max: 100)

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Token for pagination (obtained from the previous page's response)

200.description: Paginated available voices response with next page token

500.description: Internal Server Error: Failed to get voices

get.description: Search and filter voices based on various parameters.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 20, min: 10, max: 100)

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Token for pagination (obtained from the previous page's response)

parameters.name: use_cases
parameters.description: Filter by use cases array (comma-separated for OR logic)

parameters.name: style
parameters.description: Filter by style (comma-separated for OR, semicolon-separated for AND). Mixing comma and semicolon is invalid and will result in 400. Note: AND semantics apply across styles on a single character; cloned voices have a single style and will only match AND when exactly one style is requested and equals the cloned voice style.

200.description: Paginated available voices response with next page token

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid style parameter (use either comma (OR) or semicolon (AND), not both)

500.description: Internal Server Error: Failed to get voices

get.description: Gets detailed information about a specific voice by its voice ID. Only supports preset voices.

404.description: Not Found: Voice not found or not accessible with the provided API key

500.description: Internal Server Error: Failed to get voices

post.description: Creates a custom (cloned) voice from uploaded audio files.

files.description: Audio file to clone voice from (WAV/MP3 format, max 3MB)

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid file or request data

403.description: Forbidden: Insufficient tier access (STARTER tier or higher required)

404.description: Not Found: No custom voices found

413.description: Payload Too Large: File size exceeds 3MB limit

415.description: Unsupported Media Type: Invalid audio file format

429.description: Rate Limit Exceeded: Too many requests (10 per 60 seconds)

500.description: Internal Server Error: Failed to get custom voices

get.description: Gets a paginated list of custom (cloned) voices available to the user, using token-based pagination.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 20, min: 10, max: 100)

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Token for pagination (obtained from the previous page's response)

200.description: Paginated custom voices response with next page token

404.description: Not Found: No custom voices found

500.description: Internal Server Error: Failed to get custom voices

get.description: Search and filter custom (cloned) voices based on various parameters. Space-separated terms in name/description fields use AND condition (all terms must be present).

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 20, min: 10, max: 100)

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Token for pagination (obtained from the previous page's response)

200.description: Paginated custom voices search response with next page token

404.description: Not Found: No custom voices found

500.description: Internal Server Error: Failed to search custom voices

get.description: Gets details of a specific custom (cloned) voice by ID.

404.description: Not Found: Voice does not exist

500.description: Internal Server Error: Failed to get cloned voice

patch.description: Partially updates properties of a custom (cloned) voice by ID.

404.description: Not Found: Voice does not exist

500.description: Internal Server Error: Failed to update cloned voice

delete.description: Deletes a custom (cloned) voice by ID.

404.description: Not Found: Voice does not exist

500.description: Internal Server Error: Failed to delete cloned voice

get.description: Retrieves a list of all TTS API usage records filtered by a specified date range. All dates are in UTC+0 timezone.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

200.description: A list of TTS API usage records matching the specified date range.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Failed to get usages

get.description: Retrieves API usage data with advanced features including time bucketing, multi-dimensional breakdowns, and pagination. All timestamps should be in RFC3339 format.

parameters.name: breakdown_type
parameters.description: Dimensions to break down usage data

408.description: Request Timeout: Processing took longer than 30 seconds

500.description: Internal Server Error: Failed to get usages

get.description: Retrieves credit balance of the user.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Failed with credit system.

info.title: Supertone Public API
info.description: Supertone API is a RESTful API for using our state-of-the-art AI voice models.

example.message: Failed to convert text to speech

text_guidance.description: Text guidance parameter for generation control

text.description: The text to convert to speech

language.description: The language code of the text

style.description: The style of character to use for the text-to-speech conversion

model.description: The model type to use for the text-to-speech conversion

output_format.description: The desired output format of the audio file (wav, mp3). Default is wav.

include_phonemes.description: Return phoneme timing data with the audio

text.description: The text to convert to speech. Max length is 300 characters.

style.description: The style of character to use for the text-to-speech conversion

model.description: The model type to use for the text-to-speech conversion

output_format.description: The desired output format of the audio file (wav, mp3). Default is wav.

url.description: URL to the sample audio file

samples.description: URL to the sample audio file for the voice

thumbnail_image_url.description: URL to the thumbnail image for the voice

total.description: Total number of available characters (might be approximate or removed in future)

next_page_token.description: Token for fetching the next page of results. Undefined if no more pages.

samples.description: URL to the sample audio file for the voice

thumbnail_image_url.description: URL to the thumbnail image for the voice

voice_id.description: Unique identifier for the created voice

message.example: Unsupported audio format. Supported formats: WAV, MP3. Received: application/json

voice_id.description: Unique identifier for the custom voice

total.description: Total number of available custom voices

next_page_token.description: Token for fetching the next page of results. A valid non-negative integer string (e.g., "10", "20"). Null if no more pages.

description.example: A warm and friendly voice for customer service
An updated warm and friendly voice for customer service
An updated warm and friendly voice for customer service

date.description: The date of the API usage in YYYY-MM-DD format.

voice_id.description: The unique identifier for the voice used in the API call.

name.description: The name of the voice used in the API call.

style.description: The style of the voice used in the API call.

language.description: The language of the voice used in the API call.

total_minutes_used.description: The total duration (in minutes) of API usage for the specified voice and date.

model.description: The model name used for text-to-speech.

thumbnail_url.description: The URL to the thumbnail image for the voice.

results.description: Array of usage results within this time bucket

data.description: Array of time buckets containing usage data

total.description: Total number of time buckets across all pages
